mapper.select: select to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as users from history where m_id = #{m_id} group by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM')
select count(*) from review where substr(r_code,0,14)=#{m_id} and substr(r_code,15) like 'L%'
select count(*) from review where substr(r_code,0,14)=#{m_id} and substr(r_code,15) like 'H%'
select count(*) from ban where m_id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from (select r.tid, r.re_crn, r.re_time, r.re_amt, r.use_cash, p.pay_company from receipt r inner join payment p on r.sid = p.SID where r.m_id = #{m_id})

select tid, re_crn, re_time, re_amt, use_cash, pay_company from (select rownum rn, r.tid as tid, r.re_crn as re_crn, r.re_time as re_time, r.re_amt as re_amt, r.use_cash as use_cash, p.pay_company as pay_company from receipt r inner join payment p on r.sid = p.SID where r.m_id = #{m_id} and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select p.po_exact as po_exact , p.po_result as po_result , p.po_course as po_course , p.po_time as po_time, m.m_point as m_point from point p inner join member m on p.m_id = m.m_id where p.m_id = #{m_id} and substr(po_time,1,6) between substr(to_char(systimestamp,'yyMMddhh24missff'),1,6) - 7 and substr(to_char(systimestamp,'yyMMddhh24missff'),1,6)

select merchant_uid, h_allfare, m_name, h_s_place, h_f_place, car_no, car_model from history h inner join member m on h.d_id = m.m_id inner join car c on m.m_id = c.m_id where h.m_id = #{m_id} and to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,6),'yyMMdd') between sysdate - 7 and sysdate
